attributes.action: Deport all foreign criminals and revoke citizenship for dual national criminals.
attributes.additional_details:
The government must enact stronger laws that revoke citizenship and deport all foreign criminals to ensure public safety and preserve the integrity of our nation.

This is our home and it's high time we put its law abiding people first.

I urge you to sign this petition, to start a movement toward a safer UK free from foreign criminals.
attributes.background:
UK citizens have bonafide concerns about increased criminality committed by foreign nationals.

Our accepting country should not be a safe haven for criminals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705093
